nodes.text: A male Mandalorian sentry was a member of Clan Ordo. In 3954 BBY he joined his clan in the search for Mandalore's Mask on Rekkiad. He was part of the group that ambushed the Jedi Master Revan and Canderous Ordo.

This male individual was a Mandalorian sentry and a member of Clan Ordo. In 3954 BBY he joined his clan in the search for Mandalore's Mask on Rekkiad. He and three other sentries ambushed the Jedi Master Revan and Canderous Ordo when they attempted to find Clan Ordo's campsite. He ordered the pair to lay down there weapons and identify themselves. Canderous replied that he was a member of their clan and refused to lay down his weapon. Another sentry, Edric, asked Canderous to prove that he was who he said he was. After a quick retort by Canderous the sentry and his group led Canderous and his friend to their campsite.
The Clan Ordo sentry first appeared in Drew Karpyshyn's novel The Old Republic: Revan which was released on November 15, 2011.
